status.500: There has been a server error

put.message: There has been a problem updating {item}

patch.message: There has been a problem updating {item}

post.message: There has been a problem creating {item}

delete.message: There has been a problem deleting {item}

get.message: There has been a problem fetching {item}

delete.message: This is a custom DELETE success message for 'filter'
You have archived 1 dataset and can now find the dataset metadata in the Archived tab. The dataset will no longer show up in search results

cohortDiscoveryRequest.title: Cohort Discovery Registration
cohortDiscoveryRequest.text: Your Safe People status will be assessed based on your Gateway registered <userprofile>user profile</userprofile>. Please ensure this is complete and up to date before you submit this request and includes your institutional email address and role description.
cohortDiscoveryRequest.terms: You can review your terms and conditions <terms>here</terms>

profile.title: Your profile
profile.text: Use this form to register an account and update your account on the Gateway

cohortDiscoveryAdmin.title: Cohort Discovery Admin
cohortDiscoveryAdmin.text: Find and manage status of all Cohort Discovery users, Click individual account users name to access decision page to review and edit status

teams.title: Teams
teams.text: Onboard and manage data provider teams on the Gateway

create.title: Add Team’s details
create.text: Add details of the data publisher team you want to create on the Gateway

edit.title: Edit Team details
edit.text: Edit the details of this data provider team on the Gateway

datasets.title: Datasets
datasets.text: View, add, edit, archive and check the status of your datasets.

unarchive.title: Unarchive this dataset
unarchive.content: Select whether you would like to move this dataset to Active (this will make your dataset available within search results) or Draft (where you can edit the dataset metadata before making it available within search results).
unarchive.label: Unarchive dataset

archive.label: Archive dataset metadata so it is no longer live on the Gateway

TeamMembers.lastRoleAdminMessage: All team members must have at least one role. If you would like to remove a team member, the 'remove team member' button can be found in the 'Actions' column.
TeamMembers.lastRoleMessage: All team members must have at least one role. Please contact your team admin to remove a team member.
TeamMembers.noPermission: You do not have permission to edit this
TeamMembers.deleteLastMember: You are unable to delete the last member of a team. Please raise an enquiry.
TeamMembers.deleteYourself: You are unable to delete yourself. Please contact your team admin.

create.title: Integration
create.text: Input and edit the authentication information for the Gateway system to use for the integration.
create.helper: Entities created via an FMA integration can only be managed (updated or deleted/archived) via the FMA integration. Entities created via another method (manual, API integration) cannot be managed via the FMA integration.

create.title: API management
create.text: Use this form to create, update and manage your api on the Gateway

permissions.title: Permissions
permissions.intro: Use this form to assign the right level of scope and permission for the application to manage integration and connect securely to the Gateway. Your application will only be able to synchronize data within its assigned scope and permission. Application permissions is the responsibility of your publisher team
permissions.helper: Entities created via an API integration can only be managed (updated or deleted/archived) via the API integration. Entities created via another method (manual, federated integration) cannot be managed via the API integration.

home.touchDevice: Explore the different functionalities of the Gateway

datasets.label: Datasets / Tissues
datasets.title: Welcome to The Gateway
datasets.text: A knowledge graph to explore and access the wealth of health data and research from across the UK and beyond

dur.label: Data Uses / Research projects
dur.title: Welcome to The Gateway
dur.text: Find data uses/research projects: Search and filter data uses/research projects related to specific datasets and other features

feasibility.label: Feasibility Analysis
feasibility.title: Welcome to The Gateway
feasibility.text: Compare the number of relevant records across different datasets: Query federated datasets to find out how many records match a specified criteria e.g. the number of female asthmatics”

dataProviders.label: Data Providers
dataProviders.title: Welcome to The Gateway
dataProviders.text: Discover information about our data providers: Search and filter data providers and find out how to contact them and the process to access their data.

collections.label: Collections
collections.title: Welcome to The Gateway
collections.text: Discover datasets, software and data uses that are grouped around a particular topic: Search and filter collections based on features such as network, disease, or theme

phenotypes.label: Phenotypes
phenotypes.title: Welcome to The Gateway
phenotypes.text: Find reusable phenotype algorithms: Search and deposit human and machine readable phenotype algorithms

diseaseAtlas.label: Disease Atlas
diseaseAtlas.title: Welcome to The Gateway
diseaseAtlas.text: Analyse the prevalence of disease, prognosis and associated clinical guidelines on a population scale

publications.label: Publications
publications.title: Welcome to The Gateway
publications.text: Understand what questions can be answered by specific dataset: Search and deposit publications which used a dataset or publications which describe a dataset

dataAnalysis.label: Data Analysis Scripts/Software
dataAnalysis.title: Welcome to The Gateway
dataAnalysis.text: Discover reusable community shared scripts and software: Search for data analysis/cleaning/transformation/standardisation scripts related to specific datasets or general software/tools

courses.label: Courses
courses.title: Welcome to The Gateway
courses.text: Lessons to help you as a Researcher from the Gateway (Copy to be changed)

search.searchExplainer: Search by keywords, phenotypes, SNOMED code, LOINC term, Read code, ICD10 code, MESH term

FilterPanel.publisherNameTooltip: Individual or organisation providing metadata on the Gateway
FilterPanel.dataUseTitlesTooltip: Public record of data an organisation has shared with other individuals or organisations for the purpose of research
FilterPanel.geographicLocationTooltip: The geographical area covered by the dataset

ResultCard.leadOrganisationTooltip: The name of the legal entity that signs the contract to access the data
ResultCard.datasetsTooltip: The name of the dataset(s) being accessed
ResultCard.dataCustodianTooltip: The individual or organisation responsible for the safe custody, transport, storage of, and access to data

populationSize.label: Population Size
populationSize.tooltip: Population size associated with the population type in the dataset

dateRangePublisher.label: Date range
dateRangePublisher.tooltip: Start and end of the time period that the dataset provides coverage for

dataStandard.label: Data standard
dataStandard.tooltip: Data models standards that the dataset has been stored in or transformed to

dataPublisher.label: Data publisher
dataPublisher.tooltip: Individual or organisation publishing metadata on the Gateway

ProtectedRoute.title: Protected route
ProtectedRoute.text: You must be logged in to view this content

CohortRequestSent.title: Request Sent!
CohortRequestSent.text: We have sent confirmation to your registered e-mail address. We will then notify you with the decision via your registered e-mail address within 5 business days.
